communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the racial profiling statistics from your department for 2023.  I am specifically requesting the number of traffic stops where the race/ethnicity of the person stopped was known vs the total number of stops.  I am also requesting the statistics for Sgt Martinez in how many total stops he made vs how many stops that he knew the race/ethnicity of the person driving.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Thomas Arnold's termination
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I'm requesting any and all emails, texts, or other documentation into the termination of the former Code Enforcement Officer, Thomas (tom) Arnold.

You're $27 will be mailed shortly.

I appreciate your cooperation in this matter and expect a reply within the mandated timeline.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Interference with Child Custody
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I'm requesting all warrant affidavits for the charge of "interference with child custody" or any variation thereof, for the years 2023 and 2024.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation and I expect a reply within the legally mandated deadline.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
